text: @GOPLeader Did u see Trump's *coronavirus briefing* yesterday Kev?? The first 15 min was a campaign rally& airing of political grievances. But go ahead &lie, as u usually do, abt Pelosi who is trying to make sure this next round of $ goes to small biz& hospitals, not Ruth's Chris steakhouse
